definition: ox/cow/bull/CL:條|条[tiao2],頭|头[tou2]/newton (abbr. for 牛頓|牛顿[niu2 dun4])/(slang) awesome

sentences.english: Miami ran plays and the Mavs played defense.
sentences.chinese: 热火打出了配合，而小牛祭出了防守。

sentences.english: Please let us have two veals.
And then went up against the Mavericks.
sentences.chinese: 接着他们又杀进决赛，勇斗小牛队。

sentences.english: The calf is nuzzling its mother.
sentences.chinese: 小牛用鼻子摩擦它的母亲。

sentences.english: Of the top payroll teams, only the Mavs are getting production equal to the investment.
sentences.chinese: 薪水册顶端的球队中，只有小牛的产出对得起投入。

sentences.english: Willard was standing courtside, watching Dallas lift the title trophy.
sentences.chinese: 他在场边看着小牛队高高举起冠军奖杯。

sentences.english: Many young cows were trampled to death in the rush.
sentences.chinese: 在仓促跳跑时，许多小牛被踩死。

sentences.english: Everything about what the Mavs have to overcome this season is internal.
sentences.chinese: 小牛下赛季要克服的就在他们自身。

sentences.english: Even the hides of "veal" calves are made into high-priced calfskin.
sentences.chinese: 即使是“食用”小牛犊也被用来制造高价的小牛犊皮。

sentences.english: Even the hides of "veal" calves are made into high-priced calfskin.
sentences.chinese: 即使是“食用”小牛犊也被用来制造高价的小牛犊皮。

sentences.english: The cowboy lassoed a calf which was beside the bush.
sentences.chinese: 牧童套住了一只在灌木丛边的小牛。

sentences.english: The book cover is made of fine calfskin leather.
sentences.chinese: 书的封面用精致的小牛皮制成。

sentences.english: And what meat will you have? The mutton is very good, and so is the roast veal.
sentences.chinese: 你要什么肉？这里羊肉非常好，烤的小牛肉也不错。

sentences.english: So! I guess I'll be Maverick and you can be Goose.
sentences.chinese: 我会唱你喜欢鹅和小牛的壮志凌云。

sentences.english: I put the veal scallops into the refrigerator before they could spoil.
sentences.chinese: 在小牛肉可能变质前，我把它们搁在冰箱里。

sentences.english: The colts and calves are gambolling round the stockman.
sentences.chinese: 小马驹和小牛犊围着饲养员欢蹦乱跳。

definition: Los Angeles Lakers/abbr. for 洛杉磯湖人|洛杉矶湖人[Luo4 shan1 ji1 Hu2 ren2]
horseman/cavalryman/knight (i.e. European nobility)/(Tw) bike rider (scooter, bicycle etc)
